titles: Fishers folly unfolded: or The vaunting Iesuites vanity discovered in a challenge of his (by him proudly made, but on his part poorely performed.) Vndertaken and answered by George Walker pastor of S. Iohn Euangelist in Watlingstreet London
author: Walker, George, 1581?-1651.
Fisher, John, 1569-1641. aut
notes: The record of a disputation between Walker and Fisher.
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
Some print faded and some pages cropped.
keywords: Catholic Church --  Controversial literature --  Early works to 1800.
